data.eml:eml: Description of the pupa and redescription of the third instar of Phileurus valgus (Olivier) (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Dynastinae: Phileurini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ibarra-Polesel, Mario G., Valle, Nestor G., Neita-Moreno, Jhon C., Damborsky, Miryam P. (2017): Description of the pupa and redescription of the third instar of Phileurus valgus (Olivier) (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Dynastinae: Phileurini). Zootaxa 4290 (3): 571-580, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4290.3.10
